mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.pk_ElectricPile pkElectricPile FROM tbl_company_rela t LEFT JOIN tbl_company c ON c.pk_CompanyId = t.pk_cpy_operate_id WHERE c.cpy_CompanyNumber = #{org}

SELECT e.pk_ElectricPile, p.pk_PowerStation, p.poSt_Name, e.elPi_ElectricPileName, e.elPi_ElectricPileCode, e.elPi_OwnProvinceCode, a.PROVINCE_NAME, e.elpi_Owncitycode, c.CITY_NAME, e.elpi_Owncountycode, d.area_name, e.elPi_ElectricPileAddress, e.comm_status, e.elPi_ChargingMode, e.elPi_OnlineTime, e.elPi_offlineTime, e.elPi_Longitude, e.elPi_Latitude, t.ts_ModelName, getFullPath('electricListImage', pk_ElectricPile) elpiImage FROM tbl_electricpile e LEFT JOIN tb_m_province a ON a.PROVINCE_ID=e.elPi_OwnProvinceCode LEFT JOIN tb_m_city c ON c.CITY_ID=e.elPi_OwnCityCode LEFT JOIN tb_m_area d ON d.area_id=e.elPi_OwnCountyCode LEFT JOIN tbl_powerstation p ON p.pk_PowerStation = e.elPi_RelevancePowerStation LEFT JOIN tbl_typespan t ON t.pk_TypeSpanId = e.elpi_TypeSpanId WHERE e.pk_ElectricPile=#{pkElectricpile}

SELECT e.pk_ElectricPile, p.pk_PowerStation, p.poSt_Name, e.elPi_ElectricPileName, e.elPi_ElectricPileCode, c.CITY_NAME, d.area_name, h.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadState, e.ep_num, h.ePHe_ElectricpileHeadId FROM tbl_electricpile e LEFT JOIN tb_m_city c ON c.CITY_ID=e.elPi_OwnCityCode LEFT JOIN tb_m_area d ON d.area_id=e.elPi_OwnCountyCode LEFT JOIN tbl_powerstation p ON p.pk_PowerStation = e.elPi_RelevancePowerStation LEFT JOIN tbl_electricpilehead h ON h.pk_ElectricPile=e.pk_ElectricPile WHERE e.pk_ElectricPile=#{pkElectricpile}
